QuestData.Title: Ella's Taste Test
QuestData.Description: Well, I finally got the brew made, but I won't know if it's any good unless some people taste it.$B$BWould you take my brew and see what the folks in Halfhill think?$B$BI... I couldn't face them myself.
QuestData.LogDescription: Ask Jogu the Drunk, Bobo Ironpaw, Farmer Yoon, and Nana Mudclaw what they think of Ella's Brew.
